message: I think this is a fair split, as I am doing most of the work in proposing.  Let's get this done quickly!
Alice, let's be reasonable. I understand you want the larger share, but I believe my contributions are equally valuable. This offer ensures a fairer distribution.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob.  This offer is still more favorable to me, but it recognizes your contributions as well.  Let's end this before the money loses even more value.

Alice, this is my final offer. It's crucial we settle this now before inflation eats away at the value any further.  This split acknowledges your initial proposal while ensuring a reasonable share for me.
